website_summaries.verdict: If you’re nervous about passing a smog test, use Lucas Oil to improve your engine’s efficiency.
pros: A blend of oils, additives, and detergents bring deteriorated gasoline or diesel engines back to life
It also lubricates carburetors and injectors, resulting in fuel mixtures that burn cleaner for more horsepower
Designed to neutralize harmful effects of low-sulfur diesel and replace the need for leaded gasoline
cons: Improved power is nice, but this product could potentially increase fuel usage as a consequence

customer_reviews.title: Again Lucas comes through
customer_reviews.text: I've been a mechanic for25 years, gear head since I was old enough to take things apart. Generally don't subscribe to "mechanic in a bottle" type potions... however, I used this in three vehicles at the same time and each made noticeable improvements.. 86 BMW 535i huge improvement in idle and response after one tank, 89 Range Rover also noticed better smoother idle and 2001 Range Rover again similar results.. don't know what they are using in the different Lucas products but I've grown to trust them all. Never disappointed..
customer_reviews.author: Nate

customer_reviews.title: I love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this for years, and it's one of the ones that I find I like the most. I try to use it every two weeks when I remember. I wouldn't read too much into the mpg increase as I didn't really notice any. However, I found that when I first started using it, with it's mpg savings, I found myself driving less heavy footed, which improved my mpg. At the end it was my driving that increased my mpg, not the product.
customer_reviews.author: Neal Codere

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product! The results are fantastic. Now don't expect more HP using this product, but does a fantastic job keeping my engine running smooth and delivers a bit more punch on acceleration. My only complaint is that I did not recieve a blue plastic topping cap to keep the bottle closed, and you might need a funnel to put this product in your car or truck. However for the price and convenience, I highly reccomend this to keep your car running smooth!
customer_reviews.author: G. Craig

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: I been using these products for a while and recommend them as your vehicle gets older. They are not expensive and judging on how my 1990 nissan pick up work truck was still running like new up until this year. I say they do their fair share of keeping your car's system up and running.
customer_reviews.author: Efrain Rox

customer_reviews.title: great treatment
customer_reviews.text: I have used it for many years.it makes a great treatment.But if you put more than it says for the gallons you have in your tank.the motor will have a small white smoke.but nothing to worry about.it will clean the engine great.I use it right before i fill up on gas at the pump.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Car mechanic said best gas treatment
customer_reviews.text: My mechanic recommended that i get this for treating my car's fuel about every 5 thousand miles. He also gave me some tips about good gas and bad gas. Because my car is fairly new, I haven't seen any difference when using it, but I guess that will come at 100k miles or more, when it's still running great!
customer_reviews.author: Dr. K. E. Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Cost effective boost
customer_reviews.text: Using this in both of our cars (pick up - regular & sports car- premium fuel) and we both feel that this additive is somewhat boosting performance (as in acceleration, not necessarily mileage). The larger bottle is probably the 2nd most cost effective way buying this - there a smaller bottles on sale that cost multiple times more and there is a larger packing that is even cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: RPB - Houston/TX

customer_reviews.title: Surprised it did anything!
customer_reviews.text: This has been put in a few vehicles at this point. 2.5L H4, 3.5L Turbo V6 and a 6.2L V8. I didn't expect much, but all vehicles are smoother at idle and the H4 gained 1mpg or less in gas milage. The V8, it's a sports car so who knows and not enough miles on the V6 yet, but it's a truck so I'm not expecting to see much there either. Is it cleaning things? Not a clue, but I know I'm gaining a bit of MPG and being smoother at idle says it must be doing something. If you buy the larger bottle and mix it 1oz per 5 gallons it drops the price quite a bit as well.
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: I've been skeptical for 48 years but now a believer
customer_reviews.text: I have always been skeptical about gas additives - all the way back to the mid-70's and STP. But after replacing my plugs and coil packs my mechanic suggested running Lucas oil injector cleaner to smooth out my rough idle. I took his advice and took the plunge and sure enough it worked! I noticed an improvement during my first tank and by the 4th tank my idle issue has been eliminated. As for power and mileage - maybe a little on both, but my F-150 with a 5.4L Triton with 104,000 miles runs better than it has in years. I'm a convert. I will continue to use it in every tank.
customer_reviews.author: Toddd L. Tomlinson

customer_reviews.title: needs a longer fill top and to be resealable.
customer_reviews.text: Well due to the tiny nozzle that isn't long enough to open the flap on fuel fill tube all it did was leak every where. Seriously upset i wasted a bunch of money on this. A resealable lid may also be handy since obviously you don't want to use an entire bottle on 25 gals. Couldn't put it back in my truck or it'd leak everywhere so threw away at the gas station. What a waste.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding product
customer_reviews.text: Both of my vehicles are older (2010 and 2007) and both have over a 100k on them. This product has helped them to run slightly more efficiently and I have seen slight improvements in MPG with regular use of this product. I normally use a small bottle in the tank of each car every six month, or when I change my oil. Helps keep cylinders and injectors working smoothly.
customer_reviews.author: TJM

customer_reviews.title: Amazing different
customer_reviews.text: Own fleet of Toyota Tundra service trucks. Amazing the difference in performance on 150,000 truck. Getting on the freeway giving extra boost of gasoline, it was sluggish to say the least. Now after two tanks with Lucas Injector Cleaner, absolute difference in performance. 1st work day of the month, every vehicle gets a splash of Lucas in the tank. The gallon size is cheap $20 - we refill the 32 oz bottle to get accurate measuring
customer_reviews.author: Spiderman

customer_reviews.title: Lucas products are all top quality and they are true ...
customer_reviews.text: Lucas products are all top quality and they are true American pride company. Try running this fuel treatment the next time you get a check engine light if tightening the gap doesn't solve it.
customer_reviews.author: Dublinbuckeye

customer_reviews.title: Will pay for itself in fuel savings and put you $$ ahead on maintenance savings
customer_reviews.text: Noticeable difference in engine sound being reduced. Now I can hear road noise I wasn't able to hear before so this little bottle is going to make me purchase new tires now. There is enough gain in mpg to justify the price. I picked up about 2 miles per gallon on a 17 mpg SUV. I'd say it's probably enough to at least break even. Haven't done the math. But to break even on mpg and have the engine noticeable quiet and also be lubricating the upper cylinder fuel pump and cleaning injectors I'd say it is a very good investment
customer_reviews.author: Stacy

customer_reviews.title: I suggest you wait no longer to buy it!
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing! Not sure what took me so long to give it a try. With my 2010 Honda Civic I would usually have a half tank of fuel at the end of the week. Now I'm about 3/4 with just the recommended ounces at fill up. I saw instant results from the very 1st use. It was mind blowing. I quickly purchased the gallon bottle which was way more bang for the buck. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Rho Main

customer_reviews.title: Helped improve my MPG and idle smoother!
customer_reviews.text: A powerful blend of oils and additives that contain no solvents. Designed to increase power and fuel mileage and also lower exhaust emissions through a more complete combustion. There are a lot of additives on the shelf at any parts store. This one is the first one I've used that I can feel the difference right away. More power, easier starts and better gas mileage. I use it in all my vehicles at least every 90 days. It cleans and lubricates the carburetor and injectors and causes the fuel to burn more thoroughly! Great product by a great reputable company!
customer_reviews.author: Muzza

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I am a huge fan of this product and have used it for years. It does increase your mileage for highway driving but you won't notice it city driving. My new Cadillac CTS is extremely finicky on the grade of fuel I use, if I use the lower grade my engine will knock every time. This product is used quite often in all my cars and it does seem to boost the efficiency of the fuel you are using. I have tested it on several tanks, the highway driving I did notice 1.8 miles per gallon increase, let alone it is doing good things inside your motor at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money great results
customer_reviews.text: This fuel cleaner is 1 of the best out there I've always gotten great results I once used it on a car that the rpm redline at 5,000 rpm added this stuff and the car started revving higher at 5500 rpm and idled so much smoother the car was automatic FYI but well worth the money if you have a neglected fuel system I always use this on cars I purchased used
customer_reviews.author: Mackenzie

customer_reviews.title: Quieted down 4Runner on cold Starts
customer_reviews.text: Was noticing our 4Runner was having pretty noisy top end especially on cold start which seems like most Toyota’s do anyway. I figured I’d give this a shot to see if it could get a little of it to subside. I was actually pretty surprised after a few tanks that the motor was noticeably quieter on cold starts. Its not like it’s silent or anything but it definitely made some tangible improvement. Didnt notice any MPG or power (I didn’t expect it to)
customer_reviews.author: Scott Birdsell

customer_reviews.title: Made a believer out of me.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered more of this product once I found it helps to cure the stutter and buckle with my 99 Civic. It is an old gal with other problems, but tackling one thing at a time.
customer_reviews.author: madnad

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly good
customer_reviews.text: Just recieved the package this morning, I added a few ounces and drove to work this morning and there was a noticeable difference. Normally I can't use 6th gear until I hit at least 45 when I'm on the back roads. This morning I was doing 38 in 6th and feels fine. Was even able to accelerate with out it lugging. Not sure if mileage increased but I'm willing to bet yes. After all I'm able to keep the rpms down and it feels like the engine has more torque. Noticed the change 5 min down the road.
customer_reviews.author: Ninja Spider 88

customer_reviews.title: Sent fast and this stuff works
customer_reviews.text: I add a little to my gas in my Ram 1500 every time I gas up. I seem to get a little better gas milage and it cleans the engine fuel and injection ports as you go. Good stuff.
customer_reviews.author: RWL

customer_reviews.title: Must have product
customer_reviews.text: Keep your car running like new and increase your gas mileage at the same time. I’ve been using Lucas for about 10 years now and will never ever turn back. My bottle arrived today and to my dismay was without it’s blue cap. Stupid mistake but it won’t keep me from ordering more for years to come. Keeps the entire fuel system lubricated and working perfectly. Must have product!
customer_reviews.author: Brian Mayfield

customer_reviews.title: Probably as good as any
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know how to rate this additive. I bought and used some just to see if I can tell a difference as some others said they could. I can’t tell any difference. My power level seems about the same and my gas mileage is the same. It might help in a motor that for some reason had carbon buildup.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: I've used this product for many years now and have had great results. I actually run this in an old 50's carbed vehicle and can notice a slight difference if I haven't added it for a while. After a few tanks with this in it there is a definitive difference in throttle response/crispness.
customer_reviews.author: Don

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Well worth it.
customer_reviews.text: I use this about once a month and never have any engine issues. Mechanics swear by Lucas products and it’s a brand that’s consistently better than the competition. Our cars are older, but the engines are running like new. Helps with gas mileage too. This is something that I always have on hand.
customer_reviews.author: Barry C. Joslin

customer_reviews.title: Some mpg improvement
customer_reviews.text: Just recently used it on my 16 Ford F-150 and my 95 Jeep Wrangler. Both running fine so really extreme change. Mpg on the Ford improved slightly and Jeep ran smoother. Hope it’s cleaning out injectors and carb . Used other similar product Sea Foam and that I can attest that it works!
customer_reviews.author: pcm

customer_reviews.title: Well tested and trusted
customer_reviews.text: I been using this product for quite a long time probly for 5 years. Yes you can't see literally the effect of it but my last car, I used it for almost 3/4 years and I never had any problem with engine and the mileage was good. so I suppose it was great. Now I bought a new car and I'm constantly using this. I put it after every 1000 miles.
customer_reviews.author: Shafaat

customer_reviews.title: Added fuel mileage per gallon
customer_reviews.text: I instantly got higher fuel mileage points everytime I added to it my fuel. Idles smoother, accelerates easier too. This isnt a solvent based product, instead, it lengthens the combustion and lubricates fuel injection components. Works great with my high mileage car
customer_reviews.author: TheShoun

customer_reviews.title: What a difference
customer_reviews.text: 2016 Hyundai Tuscan runs like a champ again. I’m not filling up the tank as fast so I know I’m getting better fuel mileage but I haven’t taken the time to figure out the difference but I’m going an extra 3 days more without refueling from the once a week routine
customer_reviews.author: John Atkinson

customer_reviews.title: Lucus Lube
customer_reviews.text: Due to a disability I seldom drive. The gas gets old and is not healthy for the engine. A friend recommended this. Within minutes after putting some in the gas tank I could feel the change in the way my car drove and sounded. I highly recommend this to help keep your car running smoothly.
customer_reviews.author: Lanore

customer_reviews.title: Initially a sceptic, I was surprised to see how well this worked on my Mazda
customer_reviews.text: Worked well in my 2012 SkyActive Mazda 3, @ 60K miles, after the performance felt sluggish and rough. I've been adding 2oz of Lucas to each fuel fill and I have noticed the response time improve and the ride becoming smoother. It has definetely made a change for the better. As a sceptic I was pleasantly surprised.
customer_reviews.author: tekiwibird

customer_reviews.title: Use it every time I fill-up
customer_reviews.text: I have a GMC Acadia and I burn a lot of gas, I use this product every time I feel like it does a excellent job. I get more gas mileage. My father said purchase this product because he’s a mechanic he said This is the best thing you can put in your car
customer_reviews.author: Angelalove

customer_reviews.title: Best fuel system cleaner and upper cylinder lubricant on the market!
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff, have used in my my volkswagen every oil change and recent used in my Jeep to quiet down lifter noise from the motor and to improve economy. It dod both and is still quiet today. Bought this as it is easier to refill the smaller bottles with I stead of constantly buying the smaller bottles for multiple vehicles.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: This stuff rocks!
customer_reviews.text: This should be in every garage.... I can immediately tell the difference in the power of my 2014 VW Jetta SE turbo, everything runs smoother and sounds better, and I get about a 1-5 mpg boost when I add it to every new tank. Great product and great investment!
customer_reviews.author: CLS

customer_reviews.title: really does work, way smoother motor
customer_reviews.text: I was iffy on getting this. I am only two tanks in and from the first tank I noticed a difference in the 18-year-old motor this was used on. not a super high mileage motor (only 131K miles) but before I got it at 125k, it was pretty neglected and had issues with misfires, leaking gaskets, burning oil, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Double A-Rod

customer_reviews.title: new bushings and O-rings - the car has stabled out - from poor performance and rough idle - it runs smooth - ...
customer_reviews.text: It has helped the injector system but after 32 years of neglect will be doing a few upgrades, new bushings and O-rings - the car has stabled out - from poor performance and rough idle - it runs smooth - just hear a few injectors clicking - "O"-rings next. I love All Lucas Products
customer_reviews.author: BLAKE RYE

customer_reviews.title: Awesome stuff...
customer_reviews.text: Solved the "stumbling" problem on diesel engine start up... I don't know if it cleaned out carbon or cleaned the injectors... BUT... My truck starts up and doesn't belch white smoke and it doesn't "chug-a lug" for 10 seconds... It took 2 tanks of fuel to clear up the problem... I'm using it all the time now...
customer_reviews.author: DAVEWASHINGTON

customer_reviews.title: Right on time delivery...just when I needed it !
customer_reviews.text: This replaces Lucas #10003.....so with that you get fuel injector cleaner, plus, lubrication of rings, upper cylinder et al. Very good product...and just watch your gas mileage go up by approx. 30 %; and also ENGINE LIFE ! Dr. MIke
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Mike Huchital

customer_reviews.title: Smaller engines seem to do better with this stuff.
customer_reviews.text: Ok on my Tundra this stuff did little to nothing. In our smaller car the mpg has gone up 1.2 mpgs. So it saved me about $2 in gas with current prices lol.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not for increased fuel mileage
customer_reviews.text: i used this in an attempt to increase my trip mileage on our van, but my mileage actually decreased by approximately 1.5 mpg over our 1200 mile trip. I can’t address any other claims for this product.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Works out of the box
customer_reviews.text: A lot cheaper the replacing fuel injectors. Makes a big difference with performance. Use it in car,lawnmowers boats etc.
customer_reviews.author: Dan B

customer_reviews.title: This is it!
customer_reviews.text: Been using this and heavy duty oil stabilizer for 20 years. Every 2-3 tanks, put about 4 ounces of this stuff in your gas tank, pump regular 87 octane. My i-4 and V6 engines respond like V8s.
customer_reviews.author: freedom1

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Been running Lucas fuel additive for years. I’ve never had an issue with any of my fuel injectors or water in fuel. I don’t notice any mileage difference I own V 8’s. I believe it’s the best product for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Sparky

customer_reviews.title: Fast shipping and great packaging, thanks for the excellent service
customer_reviews.text: I have applied diesel and if you've ever paid to have your injectors replaced you won't hesitate to put an additive in your fuel to help with the lubricity. Big fuel injectors are machines and need to be lubricated and Lucas gets it done.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria Mijares

customer_reviews.title: GREAT!!!
customer_reviews.text: Been using this for about 2 years now in a 2001 Toyota Avalon with over 250000 miles. The car runs like new....what else can I say??
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Clean product to run clean through fuel
customer_reviews.text: Excellent item to help clean the engine and fuel Lines. I put this in my F150 11 Gen Ford and the fuel economy increases, a little. Trucks runs better I think using it.
customer_reviews.author: IT Secure Force

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Got my Ford edge from 15.3 to 18.4 MPG. I use it on everything now.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Tudorache

customer_reviews.title: Magical!
customer_reviews.text: I've used this in my trucks with great results for a very long time and now I'm using it in my golf cart and WOW, what a difference it's made, has totally smoothed out the motor! Helps improve gas mileage and makes your motor last longer...
customer_reviews.author: DrBeary

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used Lucas products for years. I don’t notice any difference in performance; I mainly use it for maintenance purposes. Would highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Good not great
customer_reviews.text: Used on a 2k mile road trip to try and increase gas millage and engine run smoother, gas mileage may not of increased but engine felt smoother
customer_reviews.author: Sitt

customer_reviews.title: You Can Always Count On Lucas Products.
customer_reviews.text: I've used this fuel additive since it first came out . All I can say is that I've never had a fuel related problem in any vehicle in all the years I've used it. Great lube for the moving parts in your expensive fuel pump , too !
customer_reviews.author: scotty-48

customer_reviews.title: The Best
customer_reviews.text: My old '99 7.3 Power Stroke still runs great using Lucas fuel treatment. Been using this stuff since the truck was new.
customer_reviews.author: P  Vanderwall

customer_reviews.title: Lucas has never let me down
customer_reviews.text: I've used this a number of times and if it was less expensive I would use it more. Makes our crappy gas better.
customer_reviews.author: Jake Wray

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived very quickly and is exactly what my husband wanted for his vehicle. Unfortunately the tip/ pouring spout was broken, but he will be able to use it regardless. The box it was shipped in was entirely intact.
customer_reviews.author: Rainzo

customer_reviews.title: Keeps injectors clean
customer_reviews.text: Been using for years, especially on long trips. To blowout any carbon with might have built up, in stop, & go city driving.
customer_reviews.author: R. K. Hayes

customer_reviews.title: it help with cylinder head,spark plugs, fuel pump, fuel injectors
customer_reviews.text: Its working. 10 years using it. Never have a Problem. Car 132 K miles with Original fuel pump, injector .
customer_reviews.author: ROBERT

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Have been using this product for many years between oil changes, will always purchase for the future.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Duke

customer_reviews.title: Pays for itself
customer_reviews.text: Instantly improves my mpg. I'll get another 20 miles a tank using maybe 4oz of it. Pays for itself.
customer_reviews.author: Ice Water

customer_reviews.title: Swear by it
customer_reviews.text: I’m a big fan of Lucas products. They’re easy to use and they work well. I’ve been using this fuel additive for years and I truly believe it has saved me from many expensive engine problems. Great stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Miller

customer_reviews.title: Lucas products work
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this Lucas product for many years.usually buy the smaller 4 oz, but this 32 oz bottle is a much better deal
customer_reviews.author: GShanks3

customer_reviews.title: Regular use gives best results.
customer_reviews.text: A review of this product is subjective because I have no instruments to verify claims. It makes my 19 year old Tundra run better and quieter. I use it at every fill up. In my truck and 4 runner.
customer_reviews.author: Strom

customer_reviews.title: Make you engine last
customer_reviews.text: Using this product regularly should help make engines last with less than ideal fuel quality.
customer_reviews.author: John Herbert

customer_reviews.title: Lucas rocks
customer_reviews.text: Used this in my audi a4 car is running like a track star.... Love this stuff... I just got a bigger bottle....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I enjoy a smooth idle.
customer_reviews.text: My 2000 ford excursion has a much smoother idle and runs significantly better when I use this product. I like all of the Lucas products I have used.
customer_reviews.author: Brenton B.

customer_reviews.title: Very Good
customer_reviews.text: Used it in my boat made the motor run much better My truck added 2 miles per gal.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: It really helps to save gas and engine runs really smooth follow the instructions on the bottle that how u use :)
customer_reviews.author: Billy

customer_reviews.title: I think it works
customer_reviews.text: It's hard to say but I think this helped. I do t have any hard data, but my truck seems to be running smoother.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Best product for my automobiles.
customer_reviews.text: Save to use after every fill up. Auto's run smooth and gas mileage increased.
customer_reviews.author: R. C. Sportsman

customer_reviews.title: Good Stuff
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for years and it always does the job well. Used in my old Oldsmobile, Saturn and now my Honda Accord and it gives the engine a lot more power, and makes engine run so much smoother. Worth the money and then some.
customer_reviews.author: Stuart

customer_reviews.title: All Lucas products are a MUST
customer_reviews.text: All lucas items are a must. I use this in my diesel truck at every fill up.
customer_reviews.author: im4vols2

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Smooth out the idle and good performance and increased milage on my pickup
customer_reviews.author: Roger74

customer_reviews.title: Seems to work
customer_reviews.text: Never really know how much these sort of products actually help but have not had a fuel injector problem in any car, even one now 20 years old. Lucas has a good reputation so I will continue to use. Like this bottle as it will treat many tanks of gas for a reasonable amount of money.
customer_reviews.author: wck

customer_reviews.title: I believe
customer_reviews.text: I have used this for over twenty years,In many vehicles. I believe...

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Definitely see the difference in my Ford Ranger after using this
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good prevention maintenance
customer_reviews.text: What can I say it's lucas works well with cleaning injectors and other things
customer_reviews.author: Edward Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Makes Sense, Makes a Difference
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with the performance improvement with this additive. Very smooth operation and acceleration combined with improved lubrication and air flow to get the full potential of the 3.7LTIC-VCT. It warms my heart!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Gave me back my mileage and car runs smoother
customer_reviews.author: marco s

customer_reviews.title: Use Every 3 Or 4 Fill-ups
customer_reviews.text: I add 10 ounces to a 34 gallon gas tank every 3 or 4 fill-ups. It's helps maintain extremely clean injectors, and good throttle response among other things.
customer_reviews.author: Grateful Fred

customer_reviews.title: This saved me a lot of money.
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Saved my into the hundreds of dollars to repair my injectors. I used it in my lawnmower as well and it now starts much better.

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product and I have used it for years in my 2000 Silerado.

customer_reviews.text: Does it really work not so sure didn't really seem it change my gas mileage

customer_reviews.text: The best bang for your buck hands down. Can’t go wrong here.

customer_reviews.title: Keeps diesels happy over 300000 miles using it now
customer_reviews.text: High mileage diesel have used this for 12 years..... will keep using

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Been using this stuff for years, race cars, daily drivers, trucks, etc.

customer_reviews.title: This mixed in the gas has done a great job of getting rid of any misses of the ...
customer_reviews.text: This mixed in the gas has done a great job of getting rid of any misses of the injectors.
customer_reviews.author: Teat Puller

customer_reviews.title: Lucas 10003 Upper Cylinder Lubrication & Injector Cleaner
customer_reviews.text: My mileage has gone from 22 to 24.23 miles a gallon.
customer_reviews.author: LAJ

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: I use it my Harley Davidson, works great. Totally different sound after I add it to gas tank. High recommend item.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Best available
customer_reviews.text: Always use fuel injector cleaner. This one is the best!

customer_reviews.title: Improved performance
customer_reviews.text: i have a 2003 suburban with 340K miles. seemed a bit tired. added this and its like a young burb again! same issue with a 2007 2500 silverado, low power for towing our camper. added this to a single tank and off it went! works as advertised!!!

customer_reviews.title: Only sensible way to buy this product
customer_reviews.text: An under six ounce container of this product runs around $5 to $6 dollars in the local auto parts stores. This 32 ounce container is under $9 dollars. It's a no-brainer! Oh, and it seems to really help with the running of my autos as well.

product_meta.title: Lucas 10003 Upper Cylinder Lubrication & Injector Cleaner 32 oz.
product_meta.description: Style:CleanerLucas fuel treatment is formulated for both gasoline and diesel engines, carbureted or fuel injected. 10003. It gives your fuel system what it really needs - a blend of super slick oils and additives with a high detergent action that allows the engine to operate at maximum efficiency. Also, it cleans and lubricates the carburetor and injectors and causes the fuel to burn more thoroughly for increased power and less fuel consumption. Lucas fuel treatment should definitely be used in vehicles that require leaded fuel because it actually replaces the benefits of lead in gasoline without causing harmful emissions. Use it to pass smog tests. Finally, it totally neutralizes the harmful effects of low sulfur diesel fuel.
feature_bullets: Lucas fuel treatment is formulated for both gasoline and diesel engines, carbureted or fuel injected
Use it to pass smog tests. Finally, it totally neutralizes the harmful effects of low sulfur diesel fuel.
